original_text: At that time, I will help you. I will not punish you as you deserve for your wicked and evil acts. Instead, I will do things that bring honour to my name. Then, Israel's people, you will know that I am the Lord. That is what the Almighty Lord says.” ’
korean_text: 이스라엘 족속아 내가 너희의 악한 길과 더러운 행위대로 하지 아니하고 내 이름을 위하여 행한 후에야 내가 여호와인 줄 너희가 알리라 주 여호와의 말씀이니라

sentences.original_text: At that time, I will help you.
sentences.korean_translation: 그 때에 내가 너를 도울 것이다.

sentences.original_text: as you deserve for your wicked and evil acts.
sentences.korean_translation: 네 악하고 사악한 행위로 마땅히 받아야 할 만큼.

sentences.original_text: that bring honour to my name.
Then, Israel's people, you will know
sentences.korean_translation: 그러면 이스라엘 백성아, 너희가 알게 될 것이다.

sentences.original_text: That is what the Almighty Lord says.
